short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Batch image snap feature to collect all visible image resources from the webpage to Sparkbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sparkbox Websnap let you load the entire webpage directly from Chrome to Sparkbox, which customer can then easily collect the entire web page or the images inside the page to Sparkbox.
